page.title: 08KNOWLE QUARRY
page.content: { KNOWLE QUARRY}is in Brightley Road at Okehampton.The quarry begins work at eight a.m and closes at five p.m.They have eight people working there including a secretary.They have two machines.They dig up lots of stones.The business began before World War Two.The business was begun by three brothers called Colin,Terry and David Barkwell. The busiest time is in the Autumn. Most of the people live in {Okehampton.} They get the stone delivered to places where they use them to make lots of different things. The{by-pass}might go north and if it does it will affect Knowle Quarry. The people working there might have to find new jobs. If the by-pass goes south it would save the quarry.
